query:
INSERT INTO teams (name, description, createdById, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES 
('POS', 'Point of Sale Team - Verkauf vor Ort', 1, NOW(), NOW()),
('Versand', 'Versand-Team - Logistik und Versand', 1, NOW(), NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name);
